Package model

Class AbstractSudoku

java.lang.Object
model.AbstractPuzzle
model.AbstractSudoku
Direct Known Subclasses:
Killer, Sudoku
public abstract class AbstractSudoku extends AbstractPuzzle
Abstract base class for all Sudoku-like puzzles like Sudoku and Killer with the additional constraint of sub-grids with unique values.

This class provides the following public interface in addition to AbstractPuzzle:

  • getSubGridSize() - for providing information about the sub-grids of an AbstractSudoku
